room_title: Escape room "The Neighbors" by Twin Falls Escape Rooms in Twin Falls
review: This room was great. My friends and I had so much fun. There are so many locks and clues that we had to work together or I would still be in there

room_title: Escape room "The Neighbors" by Twin Falls Escape Rooms in Twin Falls
review: So much fun! We did the Neighbors and we had a blast. Almost solved it, we had the code on the last second.

room_title: Escape room "The Neighbors" by Twin Falls Escape Rooms in Twin Falls
review: We had so much fun doing this with our family. The neighbors was a fun room with lots of twists. The workers were great to work with and have a fantastic sense of humor and are great to work with. Would recommend to anyone to give it a try!

room_title: Escape room "The Neighbors" by Twin Falls Escape Rooms in Twin Falls
review: We had such a great time! From the moment the clock started until “The Neighbors” came back home, it was non-stop fun! Can’t wait to do it again!

room_title: Escape room "The Neighbors" by Twin Falls Escape Rooms in Twin Falls
review: What a great time this was! Amazing staff and very well put together. This is a great thing to have in Twin Falls. We can't wait to do more rooms! I encourage anyone and everyone to do this. It's a great way to spend family and friend time, mind challenging and overall just a fantastic time!

room_title: Escape room "The Neighbors" by Twin Falls Escape Rooms in Twin Falls
review: What an amazing establishment to have in Twin Falls. We had a group of 9 and had a blast! Exceeded my expectations and I would encourage anyone to give them business! They were very friendly and inviting. The room was so much fun and not easy to solve!
